title: Regional Blackout
custom_preconds:
given Regional Blackout game set up in QA with at least 3 Audio Feeds
[Region 3 is SF, Region 1 is NY - currently only, confirm with Media Framework team]
OR Regional Game available in Prod
custom_steps:
When the user opens a regionally Blacked-out game tile in Game view
And launches audio Feed
AND Launches any VOD or live game that is not blacked out
AND backs out to Console view
AND launches Regional B.O game tile in console view

( 1. Open Regional BO game tile in Games view - Launch Audio Feed 2. Launch any VOD or live game that is not blacked out 3. Back out to Console view 4. Launch Regional BO game tile in Console view)
custom_expected:
Then Scores View - Blackout Feed Select seen with expected BO messaging & Audio can be launched Console View 
AND BO Message overlay is seen Expected text: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89355557#MLB.TVBlackout&ErrorMessaging-MLB.TVBlackoutScenarios

title: National Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN National Blackout game ha been set up in QA with at least 3 Audio Feeds
OR
National game available in Prod
AND the 

User logged in with entitled account
custom_steps: 1. Open National BO game tile in Games view - Launch Audio Feed 2. Launch any VOD or live game that is not blacked out 3. Back out to Console view 4. Launch National BO game tile in Console view
custom_expected: Games View - Blackout Feed Select seen with expected BO messaging & Audio can be launched Console View - BO Message overlay is seen Expected text: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89355557#MLB.TVBlackout&ErrorMessaging-MLB.TVBlackoutScenarios

title: Local Blackout
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Local Blackout game set up in QA with at least 3 Audio Feeds
OR
Local BO game available in Prod

User logged in with entitled account
custom_steps: WHEN 1. Open Local BO game tile in Games view - Launch Audio Feed 2. Launch any VOD or live game that is not blacked out 3. Back out to Console view 4. Launch Local BO game tile in Console view
custom_expected: THEN Games View - Blackout Feed Select seen with expected BO messaging & Audio can be launched Console View - BO Message overlay is seen Expected text: https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89355557#MLB.TVBlackout&ErrorMessaging-MLB.TVBlackoutScenarios
